name: Pat a lost Pikachu (Fake Whac-a-Mole)
description:
A new version of my first Html knock off indie game in late November 2021. https://gavtaka.itch.io/pikapikamole

Thanks to developer Halil Halid (EMA)

Music: stolen online,  but for other music listening please click: https://www.mysteppe.com/category/music/music-releases/
